item.title: How to Set up Tasks for Focus Sessions in Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Add a Task How to Select a Task: With Click With Right Click How to Deselect a Task: With Click With Right Click How to Mark a Task as Not Complete: With Click With Right Click How to Mark a Task as Not Started: With Click With Right Click How to Rename a Task: With Click With Double Click How to Delete a Task No time to scroll down?
